sentence.Network_en: Her reasons for acting are morally defensible.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的举动从道义上来讲是合情合理的。
堕胎从道德上讲合乎情理吗？

sentence.Network_en: Economic activities were seen as the only defensible form of American involvement abroad.
sentence.Network_cn: 经济活动被认为是美国插手海外的唯一可以辩护的形式.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (used of a weapon, a fortified place, etc. in the sense 'capable of giving protective defence'): from late Latin defensibilis, from Latin defendere (see defend)

entry.tran: (观点、制度或行动)可辩护的，正当有理的，情有可原的
entry.def: An opinion, system, or action that is defensible is one that people can argue is right or good.

example.ex: Her reasons for acting are morally defensible.
example.tran: 她的举动从道义上来讲是合情合理的。

auth_sentence.content: That is a really defensible position on your part.
auth_sentence.res_content: That is a really defensible position on your part.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That is a really defensible position on your part.

auth_sentence.content: The decision to publish it was defensible though far from unassailable.
auth_sentence.res_content: The decision to publish it was defensible though far from unassailable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The decision to publish it was defensible though far from unassailable.
